page.title: 08ST.MICHAEL'S CHURCH
page.content: The main church in Thorpe is{St. {Michaels Church}which was built in an Early English style. Since it was ori ginally built it has been changed considerably.The tower was rebuilt in the 18th century,the interior altered so that it could seat about 100 people in 1874 and the outside was rebuilt in 1912. Since being altered the tower has changed it's position,the window in the north side has got smaller,and the original main door has been blocked up and a new one put in at the bottom of the tower. The tower originally contained a clock and two bells but a third was donated in the early 1900's by the Rev T.Hedley. The church also has a small graveyard outside the main building.
